action.name: startup
action.code:
def startup(): # init everything action('init-human', {}) action('init-bot0', {})
makeHuman = vimport('makeHuman') human = makeHuman() human.alive = True
map0 = action('newmap', {'mapType':'airship-'}) map0.setAlive()
spawn = map0.attr('centre') map0.putOn(spawn[0], spawn[1], 'monster', human)
return human
_return = startup()
